text:
Vicki Gunvalson may have a new man in her life, but it seems like she just can’t quit talking about her ex-Brooks Ayers.

While out promoting the twelfth season of the Real Housewives of Orange County Vicki had a message for fans about her ex.

“He wasn’t this monster in my life. He wasn’t. The viewers may think he was, but he wasn’t,” Vicki explained to E! News. “Did he turn into a monster towards the end? He did a lot of weird ass crazy things that I still don’t understand because I don’t talk to him.”

She added, “I don’t know why he did what he did, but he wasn’t a monster. He wasn’t really the man I thought he was if he did what he did to me.”

In fact, Vicki says if she could talk to Brooks one on one she’d ask him one question: why?

“Why did you reveal bad records? Why did you do what you did to me?” Vicki explained. “We had a good thing going, or so I thought, but why? I still don’t know why. I’ve never been able to get the answer from him.”

If you don’t remember Brooks faked cancer and showed off fake cancer documents to the media and Vicki’s RHOC co-stars in hopes of shutting down doubts about his health.

Ultimately, it was revealed that Brooks never had cancer and was never treated by City of Hope Medical Center.

And to make matters worse, Vicki called her relationship with Brooks “great” in the RHOC season 12 premiere. Gag!

Oh, Vicki. Somehow I feel like Vicki isn’t fully over Brooks and I don’t think she ever will be. Why is she still talking about him? No one cares. And anything Vicki says about Brooks isn’t going to change people’s minds about Brooks or her possible involvement in his cancer scam. It’s a shame Vicki can’t seem to forget Brooks especially when her new boyfriends seems so great. I want Vicki to be happy, and I think she is with her new man so I wish she’d just close the chapter on Brooks. You know, outta sight outta mind.

Thoughts on Vicki’s interview? Why do you think Vicki still talks about Brooks? Was Brooks a monster? Do you believe Vicki never knew anything about Brooks cancer scam? Was Vicki’s relationship with Brooks “great?” Does Vicki need to stop talking about Brooks?
